name: Monkey Money Slots LITE
description:
The cheeky monkey grins his way to huge virtual wins in Monkey Money, the most fun jungle themed slot machine simulation on the planet!

Fantastic additional features include the "Coconut Feature" - race against other monkeys to climb a tree and win free games.

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
